resources.string: "Recovery Executer, lets you flash a zip,tar,tar.md5,img,bin on recovery selecting it on the file browser! Click on menu button and select the option you desire. On menu option \"Configuration\" you can select the default path for the file browser. Select if you want to do any Wipe before flashing something. For flash a kernel,modem or any other zip file simply select it from the file browser, there appear only compatible files."

"Select from the dropdown the option you want to add to the list of actions, after selecting the action click \"Add to List\" if the option is selected \"Flashing file\" will show the file browser to select the file to flash After selecting the file you need to press the button \"Add to List\". Clicking on any item that item will be removed from the list of actions.After the list click the button \"Save List\"."
Busybox is necessary but isnt installed, install busybox?
